questions: Q. 1. How does democracy produce an accountable government ?
answers: Ans. In an accountable government, people have the right to elect the leaders to form government and if possible they participated in decision making process.

questions: Q. 2. How can you say that democracies are based on political equality ?
answers: Ans. All individuals have equal weight in electing representatives.

questions: Q. 3. Name the law which empowers the people to find out what is happening in government.
